description:
Improve your project management skills and deliver your next project on-time, on-target and on-budget. Start fresh or add in LLAMA techniques (Lot Like Agile Management Approach) to your current approach to amplify your project success.

Course 1: Deliver Your Project

Take your project management skills to the next level, master the basics & keep everything on track.

  • Define the Goal
  • Build the Team
  • Define Boundaries
  • Plan for Success

Course 2: Master Project Management

In this course you'll learn to create a rich team ecosystem & hit moving targets through iterative project management practices.

  • Estimate the Work
  • Prioritize, Assign, Track
  • Handle Change with Ease

Agile is a hands-on practical approach created by the software industry to adapt to the increasing speed of change. Our LLAMA approach combines the best of traditional Agile with broader project management applications.

This two course bundle, taught by a veteran project manager, includes dynamic video, interactive practice lessons, tips from industry leaders, and downloadable PDFs. Each component is designed to be completed in short time allotments, or all at once, to suit your schedule. It will take approximately 1 hour to complete both courses.

If you've got a project you want to manage it, or it will manage you. Gain the tools you need to ace your next project.
title: Deliver Your Project & Master Project Management
